Astalty For Chrome üíª

Astalty For Chrome is a multipurpose tool for people working within the NDIS. Its purpose is to streamline the search for support items and give you quick calculations and breakdowns of budgets and sub categories. 

Our initial product is a simplified version of the NDIS Price Guide. It allows users to easily search for NDIS Support Items directly from their browser.

Prices are up to date with the most recent NDIS Price Guide. You can switch between Price Guides in the settings page.

Our second release is a budget building tool, that allows you to quickly calculate budgets and work out funding levels for your Participants. Whether you're a Support Coordinator breaking down a plan or an Administration Officer building a service agreement, you'll definitely find value in Astalty For Chrome. 

We've recently added the ability to get breakdowns of support hours, simply add in your budget, select your line item and you will know exactly hour many hours you can receive with the remaining funding.

After adding the extension as a pushpin, you will be able to select line items with a few clicks of a button.
